action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi Rika,

This request is for Heath.

Hi Chris,

Hope you are doing well.

Can you please add these DNS records for ReoHealth...

Record 1...
Type: A
Host: stape.redohealth.com.au








Value: 35.244.120.96


Record 2...
Type: AAAA
Host: stape.redohealth.com.au






Value: 2600:1901:0:1ef6::


Let me know once done so I can verify them.

Much appreciated,

Lachie Testro

— Co-Founder of Launch4impact <https://www.launch4impact.com/clinic-growth-system>

￼



---- On Fri, 15 Mar 2024 04:52:29 +0700 Chris Paradowski <chris@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:chris@wolfiq.com.au>> wrote ---

Hi Lachie,

Confirming these updates have been completed.

Regards,



Chris Paradowski
Partnerships Manager
Wolf IQ Pty Ltd

I noticed the sub-domain hasn't been verified on our end yet. Are you able to double check the records were added correctly, let me know if you need any other info.

Much appreciated,

Lachie Testro

On 12 Mar 2024, at 12:15 pm, Lachie <lachie@launch4impact.com <mailto:lachie@launch4impact.com>> wrote:

Hi Chris,

I need to add some DNS records for us to be able to send emails from a sub domain we have setup for Redo Health.

It seems the DNS records are in AWS. Are you able to add these records please.

Records we need added:

1. TXT:
pic._domainkey.info.redohealth.com.au

k=rsa;
p=MIGfMA0GCSqGSIb3DQEBAQUAA4GNADCBiQKBgQCqu/uuKJBFMCVkOEWvIOtdFmiYDHwjm5cQ4XR4lXUgd/N1vUuOvZbqxkj7LGTYK/1DsT3OHg7Z3RCgm5eqgqB02CAWow91G1HF3CNTSHIC/Ma9WSyNIQ8WxS0Id4FkFWcndxgViFL+IxuPKa9XZqIcWZNYtVS7NL9rMPzygfRmqwIDAQAB


2. TXT:
info.redohealth.com.au
v=spf1 include:mailgun.org ~all


3. CNAME:
email.info.redohealth.com.au
mailgun.org


4. MX:
10
info.redohealth.com.au
mxa.mailgun.org


5. MX:
10
info.redohealth.com.au
mxb.mailgun.org





Thanks you very much,

Lachie Testro

— Co-Founder of Launch4impact <https://www.launch4impact.com/clinic-growth-system>

<3.png>

Brendan McGovern

On Tue, Mar 12, 2024 at 10:43 AM Lachie <lachie@launch4impact.com <mailto:lachie@launch4impact.com>> wrote:


Hey Brendan,

Was just having some issues with domain integration that we do for sending emails from Clinic Growth System.

Crazy domains are telling me that AWS manages the DNS records.

Have you go login details for AWS?

Thanks,

Lachie Testro

— Co-Founder of Launch4impact <https://www.launch4impact.com/clinic-growth-system>

<4.png>
